title: Black boxes while in Match History
body:
I have encountered these black boxes multiple times (Check the picture down below) after entering the match history. (Patch 0.4) However, it seems to appear only for couple seconds. Please check it out as soon as possible, thank you very much.

P/S: I can't click the play button (Or the whole top bar) during those black boxes appearance.

Picture:
http://imgur.com/M0z7dkl

replies.body:
Hey, I'd like to get a little more info to help us track this bug down.  Does this appear every time you hit this screen?  Does it occur multiple times per logged-in session?  Are there things you're doing consistently before you notice it appearing? (E.g., does it only appear after you play a game? Right after logging in and going directly to that screen? Taking some other action?)

Anything else that you can share to help us reproduce this consistently would be super helpful. Thanks!
I would like to say "yes" to all of your questions because they describe exactly what I am encountering.
